sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties"><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices/><description>Allow survey link from email to open in service portal view (applies only for surveys)</description><ignore_cache>false</ignore_cache><is_private>false</is_private><name>sn_portal_surveys.sp_survey.email_redirection</name><read_roles/><suffix>sp_survey.email_redirection</suffix><sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-07-23 20:15:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>dcd0aea56730220005d1ff5557415a9a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sn_portal_surveys.sp_survey.email_redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal Surveys" source="sn_portal_surveys">67ac5062db10220035417878f0b8f5c4</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Service Portal Surveys">67ac5062db10220035417878f0b8f5c4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_properties_dcd0aea56730220005d1ff5557415a9a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-04-02 17:28:52</sys_updated_on><type>boolean</type><value>true</value><write_roles/></sys_properties><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=dcd0aea56730220005d1ff5557415a9a"/></record_update>
